about_the_game: "ZOMBIE ROCKSTAR" is a platform hack and slash video game in which you will play a punk guitarist escaping from the zombie canival holocaust. The only weapon he has is his electric guitar, with which he will create infernal riffs that will accumulate energy and allow him to use special powers to defeat his enemies. Through a fast-paced and frantic story you will enjoy good rock at the hands of charismatic characters.

content_descriptors.notes: El personaje principal que utiliza el jugador usa su guitarra eléctrica para desmembrar a los zombis que lo atacan. Durante el juego aparecen power ups de los cuales se sugiere que uno de ellos es una cerveza.

detailed_description: "ZOMBIE ROCKSTAR" is a platform hack and slash video game in which you will play a punk guitarist escaping from the zombie canival holocaust. The only weapon he has is his electric guitar, with which he will create infernal riffs that will accumulate energy and allow him to use special powers to defeat his enemies. Through a fast-paced and frantic story you will enjoy good rock at the hands of charismatic characters.
name: ZOMBI ROCKSTAR Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8400 | AMD Phenom II X4 965
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTS 250 | AMD Radeon HD 6670
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel i5+
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960 / Radeon HD 5750 or better
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: ZOMBI ROCKSTAR is a platform game with zombies and rock and roll in which you will travel the city escaping from the holocaust zombie canival.
